item.title: Bellman-Held-Karp Hamiltonian path and Traveling Salesman
item.description: Figure below make with mypaint and a Bamboo table on Ubuntu Floyd-Warshall connection This section can be skipped, because it is basically my own brain mapping of this problem, since I feel there are some similarities with Floyd-Warshall. For FW, I think of a source and destination pair \(i\) and \(j\) going through some intermediate node \(k\), and relaxing in a reverse triangle inequality kind of way, i.e.
